text: Elisha said, “Hear Yahweh’s word. Yahweh says, ‘Tomorrow about this time a seah7:1 1 seah is about 7 liters or 1.9 gallons or 0.8 pecks of fine flour will be sold for a shekel,7:1 A shekel is about 10 grams or about 0.35 ounces. In this context, it was probably a silver coin weighing that much. and two seahs of barley for a shekel, in the gate of Samaria.’”
